ceo_buyer.justification: Peter Bird is the Chairman of the acquiring company, Cosmo Metals. The text states: 'Cosmo’s Chairman, Peter Bird commented: “This acquisition represents a transformational moment for Cosmo Metals..."

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states that Cosmo Metals has entered into a Binding Heads of Agreement to acquire '100% of the Bingara and Nundle gold - antimony and copper projects'.

currency.justification: Payments are denoted with a '$' symbol and the acquiring company, Cosmo Metals, is listed on the ASX (ASX:CMO), implying the currency is Australian Dollars.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The total cash payment is the sum of all components, including conditional payments, per the aggregation rule. This includes: $50,000 exclusivity fee + $250,000 completion cash + $800,000 (max JORC resource milestone) + $250,000 (scoping study) + $500,000 (DFS).

share_payments_raw.justification: The total value of share payments is the sum of all share-based consideration. This includes: $450,000 in Completion Consideration Shares + $450,000 in the first tranche of Performance Shares + $1,000,000 in the second tranche of Performance Shares.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The deal terms explicitly separate cash and share payments, so this field is not applicable per the financial extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The total number of shares to be issued is the sum of the completion and performance shares: 30,000,000 (Completion) + 96,666,667 (Total Performance Shares) = 126,666,667.

issued_share_price.justification: The consideration shares are issued 'at a deemed issue price of $0.015'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The exploration commitments are defined by a monetary value, not a drilling distance in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The total exploration commitment for the Bingara project is the sum of its specific pre-completion funding ($150,000) and its half-share of the post-completion shared commitment ($1,000,000 / 2 projects = $500,000). The text states: 'fund exploration activity of up to $150,000 on the Bingara Project' and 'expend at least $1,000,000 of exploration expenditure on the projects in the 12 months immediately following Completion'.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Cosmo has agreed to fund exploration of up to $150,000 on the Bingara Project pre-completion and will use best endeavours to expend its share of at least $1,000,000 on both the Bingara and Nundle projects within 12 months post-completion.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: a) Pre-Completion, Cosmo has agreed to fund exploration activity of up to $150,000 on the Bingara Project... b) Post Completion, Cosmo has undertaken to use its best endeavours to expend at least $1,000,000 of exploration expenditure on the projects in the 12 months immediately following Completion.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The seller retained a 1.5% NSR as part of the transaction terms. The text states: 'The Seller will retain a net smelter royalty (NSR) of 1.5% on all commodities extracted from the projects.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The document explicitly states the area for the Bingara project: 'The Bingara Project, covering a contiguous area of 484.1km2...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The document explicitly states the unit for the Bingara project area: 'The Bingara Project, covering a contiguous area of 484.1km2...'

resource_size_desc.justification: The document explicitly states that any previous resource calculation is non-JORC compliant and historical: 'A small non-JORC compliant resource was calculated on the basis of this drilling in 1995'. Therefore, there is no current JORC resource to report.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The acquiring company is identified in the first highlight point as 'Cosmo Metals (ASX:CMO)'.
